item.title: Bitcoin Falls After Failing to Breach $100,000 Mark
item.description: Bitcoin prices extended their fall after failing to breach the $100,000-mark that many traders had been betting on, Zaye Capital Markets said.

item.title: The Hardest Part of Cashing In Bitcoin Is Getting the Taxes Right

item.title: One of the Hottest Stocks in the Oil Patch is a Defunct 19th-Century Railroad
item.description: A new approach to wringing cash from its swath of desert has Texas Pacific Land shares soaring.
